---
--- Generated by EmmyLua(https://github.com/EmmyLua)
--- Created by liuyubao.
--- DateTime: 2021/12/30 16:22
---@class MoveSystem:ISystem
local MoveSystem = SimpleClassUtil:class(ISystem)

function MoveSystem:initialize()
    ISystem.initialize(self)
end

function MoveSystem:getEventHandleMap()
    return {
        [EventType.Event_Battle_Render_Move_Line] = "moveLineHandle",
    }
end

function MoveSystem:moveLineHandle(data)
    local entity = self:getEntityByUid(data.uid)
    local nowPos = data.newPos
    local time = data.time
    if entity and nowPos and time then
        entity:setPosition(nowPos)
    end
end


return MoveSystem
